uk.ac.glasgow.internman
Interface OfferManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfferManagementImpl
public interface OfferManagement

Manager of the offer system. Allows approval of offers and creation of self sourced-roles;

Author:
Team L

Method Summary

Method Detail

notifyAcceptedOffer

void notifyAcceptedOffer(Role role,
                         java.lang.String managerName,
                         java.lang.String managerEmail)
Notifies the acceptance of the provided role.

Parameters:
role - The role of which acceptance to notify about.
managerName - The manager to notify.
managerEmail - The email to send the notification to.

approveAcceptedOffer

void approveAcceptedOffer(java.lang.String matriculation)
Approves an offer made to the student with the specified matriculation.

Parameters:
matriculation - of the student for which the offer is to be approved.

createNewSelfSourcedRole

Role createNewSelfSourcedRole(java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String location,
                              java.util.Date start,
                              java.util.Date end,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              java.lang.Double salary)
Creates a new self-sourced role.

Parameters:
title - Title of the role.
location - Location of the role.
start - Start date of the role.
end - End date of the role.
description - Description of the role.
salary - Salary of the role.
Returns:
an instance of the created role.
